languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Препарирование цели также накладывает испуг на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от цели, уменьшая их {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 15% до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: The attack also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their dodge and armour by -15% until the end of combat.
Dismantling Attack also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their dodge and armour by −15% until the end of combat.

Dismantling Attack also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.

languages.text: Препарирование цели также накладывает испуг на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от цели, уменьшая их {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 15% до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Препарирование цели также накладывает испуг на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от цели, уменьшая их уклонение и броню на 15% до конца боя.
Препарирование цели также накладывает испуг на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от цели, уменьшая их уклонение и броню на 15% до конца боя.

languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}解体攻击{/g}还会削弱目标周围5格内的所有敌人，使其{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低15%，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 解体{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}还会削弱目标周围5格内的所有敌人，使其{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低15%，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: El {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Ataque desmantelador{/g} también intimida a los enemigos en un radio de 5 casillas del objetivo, reduciendo su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} un − 15 % hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Ataque{/g} desmantelador también intimida a los enemigos en un radio de 5 casillas del objetivo, reduciendo su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} un − 15 % hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 攻撃解体によりターゲットを中心とした半径5セル以内のすべての敵をひるませ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−15%減少させる。
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃解体によりターゲットを中心とした半径5セル以内のすべての敵をひるませ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−15%減少させる。

languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Entwaffnender Angriff{/g} schüchtert außerdem alle Feinde in einem Radius von 5 Feldern um das Ziel ein, wodurch {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}-Wert und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −15 % reduziert werden.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Entwaffnender Angriff{/g} schüchtert außerdem alle Feinde innerhalb eines 5-Felder-Radius um das Ziel ein, wodurch ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −15 % reduziert wird.

languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Attaque de démantèlement{/g} intimide également tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 5 cases autour de la cible, réduisant leur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de −15 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attaque{/g} de Démantèlement intimide également tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 5 cases autour de la cible, réduisant leur {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de -15 % jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Söken Saldırı{/g}, ayrıca hedefin çevresindeki 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanların gözünü korkutarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerini %15 azaltır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also intimidates all enemies in a 5-cell radius around the target, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −15% until the end of combat.
